name: A Motorcycle Hill Racing vs Monster Truck Showdown Free Game
name_original: A Motorcycle Hill Racing vs Monster Truck Showdown Free Game
description:
You're a rebel biker and danger is your middle name. This chase challenge pits you against an angry monster truck that wants to run you down! Simple tap controls and hot racing action! This level filled game will keep you playing for hours. Tons of power-ups, different characters, and Game Center leaderboards to challenge your friends.

Completely FREE, download today!
